words.def: take something or somebody with oneself somewhere
two-masted sailing vessel square-rigged on both masts
One of the radiating sticks of a fan.
a facial expression characterized by turning up the corners of the mouth
above average in size or number or quantity or magnitude or extent
a unit of information equal to 1024 mebibytes or 2^30 (1,073,741,824) bytes
support resembling the rib of an animal
the writing point of a pen
gear (including necessary machinery) for a particular enterprise
strong liquor flavored with juniper berries
a heavy brittle diamagnetic trivalent metallic element (resembles arsenic and antimony chemically)
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
